Item.name: BLM_relief.sid
Item.Property: This large format image from the Bureau of Land Management was originally scanned as a 436 MB TIFF image. After MrSID encoding it is just 13 MB.

Item.name: camyard.sid
Item.Property: This image of Baltimore's baseball and football stadiums was originally 120 MB in TIFF format. It was reduced by a ratio of over 20:1 into a 5.6 MB MrSID image. Image courtesy of 3Di at www.3dillc.com.

Item.name: Seattle_toposkin_DEM.sid
Item.Property: This georeferenced Toposkins (tm) image is a 10-meter Digital Elevation Model (DEM) that was 135 MB as a TIFF. It is now just 5 MB as a MrSID image. Image courtesy of www.commenspace.org.
